text: Nena, “Kodi ndani amakupatsani zinthu kuchokera kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi? Kodi ndani amene amapereka mphamvu yakumva ndi kuona? Kodi ndani amatulutsa cha moyo kuchokera ku chakufa ndi kutulutsa chakufa kuchokera mu chamoyo? Ndani amene amalamulira zinthu zonse?” Onse adzanena kuti, “Ndi Mulungu.” Nena, “Kodi inu simungaope Mulungu?”
